snippet: The Knicks and the Hawks experienced the sports equivalent of a wardrobe malfunction Saturday night, showing up in similar uniforms.
abstract: NBA will take precautions to avoid confusion that resulted when New York Knicks, wearing orange alternate home jerseys, played the Atlanta Hawks, who were wearing strikingly similar color.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks and the Hawks experienced the sports equivalent of a wardrobe malfunction Saturday night, showing up in similar uniforms.

headline.main: N.B.A. Will Try to Avoid Repeat of Fashion Faux Pas at Garden
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Will Try to Avoid Repeat of Fashion Faux Pas at Garden
